head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BEASLEY, WILLIAM, JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BEASLEY, WILLIAM, JR.

block.p: BEASLEY-William, Jr. On July 13,2000. Of Manhasset. Beloved husband of the late Elizabeth. Dear father of William Beasley III, Elizabeth B. Pace, Katherine Regan and the Late A. Thomas Beasley. Also survived by 11 grandchildren and 4 great grandchildren. In repose at the Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd., Manhasset, Saturday 3-5 and Sunday 3-5 & 7-9PM. Funeral Mass Monday 10AM St. Mary's R.C. Church, Manhasset. Interment Nassau Knolls Cemetery, Port Washington. In lieu of flowers, donations to St. Francis Hospital would be greatly appreciated.
